title: Pamela's Garden of Eden
overview: Pamela's Garden of Eden follows iconic screen star Pamela Anderson as she leaves her Hollywood life behind, returns to her roots on the coast of Vancouver Island, and embarks on a massive restoration of her grandmother's legacy property. Joining Pamela's journey is a talented team of designers, architects and contractors who work with her through the stresses and struggles of this extraordinary renovation. A project of this scale will test both Pamela's patience and her personal life as she tries to remain focused on her dream for the property: to embrace her family's past and fulfill her vision for the future.
